body:
Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/datetimes.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/ca9e8af967817b7a922868ae7405d0eb6ed8fba2/pandas/core/arrays/datetimes.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/indexes/base.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/ca9e8af967817b7a922868ae7405d0eb6ed8fba2/pandas/core/indexes/base.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/arrays/test_datetimelike.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/ca9e8af967817b7a922868ae7405d0eb6ed8fba2/pandas/tests/arrays/test_datetimelike.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/test_base.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/ca9e8af967817b7a922868ae7405d0eb6ed8fba2/pandas/tests/indexes/test_base.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/ca9e8af967817b7a922868ae7405d0eb6ed8fba2/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_offsets.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_ticks.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/ca9e8af967817b7a922868ae7405d0eb6ed8fba2/pandas/tests/tseries/offsets/test_ticks.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tseries/offsets.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/ca9e8af967817b7a922868ae7405d0eb6ed8fba2/pandas/tseries/offsets.py) !

> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/23524?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [efd1844...cc7f5cd](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/23524?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

> Also fixes bug(?) with pd.Index(dtindex, dtype=object) returning an index of datetimes instead of Timestamps, potentially losing nanoseconds.

Seems like a fine change, but needs a release note.

> Seems like a fine change, but needs a release note.

Good point; done.

thanks @jbrockmendel 

#23593 is the followup to address ``__array__``.
